alarm_404_cause: Operation outside the compressor capacity.Malforated configuration block, engine failure
alarm_406_description: B2 compressor defective.Failure of the Earth Escape Chain
alarm_406_cause: Fault of the Earth current in the engine winding, wiring defect
alarm_407_description: B2 compressor defective.Current drop in phase L1
alarm_408_description: B2 compressor defective.Current drop in phase L2
alarm_409_description: B2 compressor defective.Current drop in phase L3
alarm_410_reason_alarm: SCPM measures a current debalating between the phases higher than 14% for 25 minutes
alarm_410_reset_type: Manual, if the alarm threshold is validated.Otherwise, automatic adjusted.
alarm_410_cause: Loss of power supply, wiring defect, loose terminal, defective connection
alarm_411_reason_alarm: SCPM measures a current debalating between the stages greater than 18% for 25 minutes
alarm_411_action_taken: Compressor shutdown if the threshold alarm is validated.
alarm_411_reset_type: Manual, if the alarm threshold is validated.Otherwise, automatic adjusted.
alarm_411_cause: Insufficient electric power, loose terminal, defective connection
alarm_412_description: B2 compressor defective.No current on the engine
alarm_412_reason_alarm: The SCPM module measures less than 10% of the MTA for more than 3 seconds
alarm_412_cause: Insufficient electric power, burnt fuses, wiring defect, defect connection
alarm_414_reason_alarm: SCPM detects 10% of MTA for 10 seconds after compressor contactor shutdown.The oil solenoid still has food.
alarm_416_description: B2 compressor defective.Reversal of the current phase in the connector
alarm_416_reason_alarm: SCPM detects a current phase inversion in the connector
alarm_416_cause: Inverted feed phases, inverted connector wiring after replacement
alarm_417_description: B2 compressor defective.Failure in the setup block
alarm_417_reason_alarm: SCPM detects a reading failure in the configuration block
alarm_417_cause: Configuration block on the poorly configured SCPM board.Defective plate.
